Welcome to Hippo CMS

Hippo CMS 7 is a user friendly open source content management system designed to deliver enterprise level performance and reliability.

If you want to learn about the most important features of Hippo CMS, have a look at the Hippo CMS Walk-through.

Try Hippo CMS yourself!

Open the following links in your browser:

Hippo Go Green live website (this is the live website - no login needed here!)

Hippo CMS (use one of the accounts below to login)

Hippo Go Green Mobile Live website (this is the live website, no need to log in here)

User accounts

In this demonstration environment, we set up three different roles. For each of these roles, there's an account listed below. Feel free to try out different roles and get a feeling for how the workflow process works in Hippo CMS.

Role

Username - Password

Author

author - author

Editor

editor - editor

Administrator

admin - admin

Extranet login

You can login to the Extranet section of the GoGreen website using the below account.

Role

Username - Password

Hippo GoGreen Reseller

filippo - filippo

   Please note

Hippo CMS runs on Internet Explorer 8, 9 and 10, Firefox 16 and higher, Google Chrome 23 and higher, Safari 5 and higher and needs cookies to be activated.
